snippet: The ability of the San Francisco Giants to retain stars like Matt Cain depends largely on having prospects turn into low-cost, high-impact players.
abstract: The ability of the San Francisco Giants to retain stars like Matt Cain depends largely on having prospects turn into low-cost, high-impact players.

headline.main: Balancing Act Helps Giants Spread Wealth
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Balancing Act Helps Giants Spread Wealth
